title: Senior Front-End Engineer
description:
- Discuss and Implement Frontend web and apps

- Take ownership of your work and try hard to get the details right
- Use the best technologies for the job considering the requirements and our team capacity

- 4 years of deliver production frontend web application (e.g. HTML, CSS, Javascript, etc.).
- Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages.

- Familiar with modern Javascript library and build system(e.g. React, Redux, VueJS, webpack and etc.).
